CustomField.description: Legislative: Directive by a governing body. Contractual: applies to de-supporting products, level of commitment to contractor/third party, adherence to Paychex Services Agreement, SLA's etc. Incpuludes internal and external SLAs. Policy: Corporate policy or executive directive.

CustomField.label: Legal/Corp Directive
